snippet.title: SPEED DREAMS - Under the Rain in Torino
snippet.description:
Today we bring you a race in the rain at the Torino road track with the Lynx XKR (based on the Jaguar XKR). As you know, under these adverse weather conditions grip and visibility suffer, especially when we chase other cars, putting a spray curtain in front of us. For this we have used our default graphics engine, SSGgraph. We hope you like it.

Remind that all in this video is under development. You can find this game and more info about this Open Source project on:
https://www.speed-dreams.net 

"Realizer" music track used in this video is from Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

#OpenSource #SpeedDreams #SimRacing #LS2
